import React from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' function Summary() { const location = useLocation(); return (
{/*

{location.state.id}

*/}

Name: {location.state.name}

Show Name: {location.state.name}

Rating : {location.state.rating}

Summary :

{location.state.summary}

) } export default Summary
